17 class TsdfMap {
18  public:
19  EIGEN_MAKE_ALIGNED_OPERATOR_NEW
20 
21  typedef std::shared_ptr<TsdfMap> Ptr;
22 
23  struct Config {
24  EIGEN_MAKE_ALIGNED_OPERATOR_NEW
25 
26  FloatingPoint tsdf_voxel_size = 0.2;
27  size_t tsdf_voxels_per_side = 16u;
28  };
29 
30  explicit TsdfMap(const Config& config)
31  : tsdf_layer_(new Layer<TsdfVoxel>(config.tsdf_voxel_size,
32  config.tsdf_voxels_per_side)) {
33  block_size_ = config.tsdf_voxel_size * config.tsdf_voxels_per_side;
34  }
35 
37  explicit TsdfMap(const Layer<TsdfVoxel>& layer)
38  : TsdfMap(aligned_shared<Layer<TsdfVoxel>>(layer)) {}
39 
41  explicit TsdfMap(Layer<TsdfVoxel>::Ptr layer) : tsdf_layer_(layer) {
42  if (!layer) {
43  /* NOTE(mereweth@jpl.nasa.gov) - throw std exception for Python to catch
44  * This is idiomatic when wrapping C++ code for Python, especially with
45  * pybind11
46  */
47  throw std::runtime_error(std::string("Null Layer<TsdfVoxel>::Ptr") +
48  " in TsdfMap constructor");
49  }
50 
51  CHECK(layer);
52  block_size_ = layer->block_size();
53  }
54 
55  virtual ~TsdfMap() {}
56 
57  Layer<TsdfVoxel>* getTsdfLayerPtr() { return tsdf_layer_.get(); }
58  const Layer<TsdfVoxel>& getTsdfLayer() const { return *tsdf_layer_; }
59 
60  FloatingPoint block_size() const { return block_size_; }
61  FloatingPoint voxel_size() const { return tsdf_layer_->voxel_size(); }
62 
63  /* NOTE(mereweth@jpl.nasa.gov)
64  * EigenDRef is fully dynamic stride type alias for Numpy array slices
65  * Use column-major matrices; column-by-column traversal is faster
66  * Convenience alias borrowed from pybind11
67  */
68  using EigenDStride = Eigen::Stride<Eigen::Dynamic, Eigen::Dynamic>;
69  template <typename MatrixType>
70  using EigenDRef = Eigen::Ref<MatrixType, 0, EigenDStride>;
71 
78  unsigned int coordPlaneSliceGetDistanceWeight(
79  unsigned int free_plane_index, double free_plane_val,
80  EigenDRef<Eigen::Matrix<double, 3, Eigen::Dynamic>>& positions,
81  Eigen::Ref<Eigen::VectorXd> distances,
82  Eigen::Ref<Eigen::VectorXd> weights, unsigned int max_points) const;
83 
84  protected:
85  FloatingPoint block_size_;
86 
87  // The layers.
88  Layer<TsdfVoxel>::Ptr tsdf_layer_;
89 };
